column5: 2 bd/1 ba roomy house in E FW. 15 min to Cowboys Stadium, Rangers Ballpark & 6 Flags/Hurricane Harbor; 20 to DTFW & Verizon Theater; 25 to Up/Downtown & Deep Ellum Dallas & 30 to Fair Park. Bonus, free parking near Pro Stadium/Ballpark, ask me how!
column8: 2 rm Home/5+, Free parking near ATT
